description: While iterating through the models contained in a fixed-size array in the actData structure, which also stores an incorrect number of models that is greater than the size of the array, a buffer overflow occurs in Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Wear in MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835
